CodeDisplayDefinition
IND01imaging study requiring contrast**Description:**Contrast agent required for imaging study.
IND02colonoscopy prep**Description:**Provision of prescription or direction to consume a product for purposes of bowel clearance in preparation for a colonoscopy.
IND03prophylaxis**Description:**Provision of medication as a preventative measure during a treatment or other period of increased risk.
IND04surgical prophylaxis**Description:**Provision of medication during pre-operative phase; e.g., antibiotics before dental surgery or bowel prep before colon surgery.
IND05pregnancy prophylaxis**Description:**Provision of medication for pregnancy --e.g., vitamins, antibiotic treatments for vaginal tract colonization, etc.
